author: andreas
content: Not as low as one would think. As I said, 8 mm are damn wide. Normally on full-frame 14 mm are considered ultra-ultra-wide, and 12 mm is just insane. Well, this is the equivalent of 12 mm. It's almost as with a fish: you have to be very careful to not get your feet into the frame. At 14 mm (FF) I would have had to be extremely low, at 12 not so.
